CustomField.description: SS2-T192 - A new field has been added to support Proforma Invoice generation via Conga Composer. It is auto-populated through a before-save flow on the Order Item, pulling the 3-character Country ISO Code from the related Product Plant Data
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ISO Country Code (3 letters), auto-filled for Proforma Invoice from Product Plant Data
CustomField.label: Country Of Origin
